body_content.explanation: an area that you are not able to see, especially the part of a road you cannot see when you are driving, behind and slightly to one side of the car:
examples: It can be very dangerous if there's a vehicle in your blind spot.

body_content.explanation: a subject that you find very difficult to understand at all, sometimes because you are not willing to try:
examples: I am pretty good at English, but I have a blind spot where spelling is concerned.
